萯字的基本解释

萯
fù
〔王萯〕古书上说的一种植物。

萯字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fù］
［《廣韻》房久切，上有，奉。］
草名。《管子·地员》：“剽土之次曰五沙……其種大萯細萯，白莖青秀以蔓。”尹知章注：“萯，草名。”一说，萯通“秠”。黑黍的一种。见王念孙《读书杂志·管子九》。
[②]［bèi］
［《集韻》簿亥切，上海，並。］
见“萯2陽”。

萯字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　萯； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1042第39
【唐韻】房久切【韻會】扶缶切【正韻】房缶切，?音婦。【禮·月令】孟夏，王瓜生。【註】草葜也。今《月令》云：王萯生。　又山名。【竹書紀年】帝孔甲三年，王畋于萯山。　又宮名。【前漢·宣帝紀】甘露二年，行幸萯陽宮。　又【集韻】蒲昧切，音佩。【韻會】符遇切，音附。義?同。　又【集韻】簿亥切，音蓓。與菩通。草也。　【字彙補】萯山，山海經音倍。又漢書萯陽宮，李裴亦音倍，字彙作防父切，誤。◎按負、?二字異音。負音附，?音倍，似萯山之萯，从?。萯草之萯从負，不可以倍音廢附音也。葜字原从挈作。

萯字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
萯字的起名意思

古书上说的一种植物。

萯
Basic explanation of words
萯
fù
[Wang Xu] A plant mentioned in ancient books.
萯
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fù］
["Guangyun" room for a long time, there is on it, Bong. ]
Cursive name. "Guanzi·Diyuan": "The next step of ploughing the soil is called Wusha...It is a kind of large quince, white stems and green flowers with vines." Yin Zhizhang's note: "Quan, grass name." One said, 萯tong "秠" ". A kind of black millet. See Wang Niansun's "Reading Magazine·Guan Zi Nine".
[②]［bèi］
["Jiyun" Book Haiqie, Shanghai, combined. ]
See "Hu 2 Yang".
萯
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Jian Characters] 　萯; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1042 Page 39
[Tang Yun] Fang Jiuqie [Rhyme Meeting] Help Fou cut [Zheng Yun] Fang Fou cut, a sound woman. 【Rite·Yueling】Meng Xia, Wang Guasheng. [Note] Grass Tie also. Today's "Yue Ling" says: Wang Xusheng.　Also the name of the mountain. [Bamboo Book Chronicles] Emperor Kong Jia's three years, Wang Qi was in Qushan.　Also the name of the palace. [Pre-Han·Xuan Emperor Ji] In the second year of Ganlu, he went to Xuanyang Palace.　[Jiyun] Pu Meiqie, sound and wear. 【Rhyme Meeting】Fu Yuqie, with sound attached. Righteous? Same.　[Jiyun] Book Hai cut, Yinbei. With Putong. Grass also.　【Word Supplement】Hushan, Shanhaijing sound times. In the Han Dynasty book at the Palace of Xuyang, Li Pei also doubled the pronunciation, and the vocabulary was used to prevent the father from cutting and mistaken. ◎Press negative and? With different sounds. The negative sound is attached, and the sound is doubled, like the 萯 Shanzhi, from the 琯. The 萯 grass is the 萯 from the negative, and the double-tone is not allowed to cancel the sound. The word 葜 was originally written from Xu.
萯
